Text: Can someone please seed, I can't seem to finish my download, it's only up to 70% :( I would really appreciate it if someone could seed, thanks!

albert,

dont delete the tiny jpg that encode handheld creates.  its cover art for the PSP.  Otherwise PSP just shows a white generic image.

Should be

Folder
    m4v
    jpg
    subfolder
       misc files.

-PT
the m4v and jpg cover art need to be named the same.  release.m4v release.jpg or rename to release (PiZ).m4v and release (PiZ).jpg
